about_the_game:
Keltika is a story-driven economic strategy game inspired by celtic myths and history. Ancient druid magic, power of the celtic gods or even perseverance and knowledge of your people - only you choose the way to conquer Keltika!

Your homelands and Gods from forgotten times are waiting for you!


As Niamh, queen of the Blue Antlers clan you will lead your people to Keltika, long forgotten land of legends and myths, ancient home of the celts. You will overcome the aftermath of past tragedies and cataclysms that drove celts away. Now Niamh is ready to face the wildling Gods used to their lonesome slumber, regain their trust and rebuild what was lost. Get to the Heart of Keltika, make this land flourish! Cernunnos, Ezus, Martre and Nodens guide your way!

Features


Gods with personalities and goals
Gods will challenge you on their lands, and if you succeed they will grant you their powers;

Altars and rituals
Every God has different altars with active and passive perks and powers that will be very helpful on your way to the Heart of Keltika;

Production chains
Your workers will build and upgrade buildings connected in chains - from simple resources to complex instruments, try to produce it all;

Logistics
It takes time for villagers to bring resources to storehouses, so keep in mind how far your buildings from your clanhouse;

Different buildings
Between the missions you can choose what buildings and powers to use to outsmart the Gods, find the perfect match!

Terraforming with magic and technology
Forgotten and lost Keltika needs your vision to become a new home for clan of Blue Antlers, your clan, mountains, lakes, you can make everything your people need.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
